verses.text:
And the child Samuel ministered unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* before Eli. And the word of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* was precious in those days ; \add there was\add* no open vision.
And it came to pass at that time , when Eli \add was\add* laid down in his place , and his eyes began to wax dim , \add that\add* he could not see ;
And ere the lamp of God went out in the temple of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, where the ark of God \add was\add*, and Samuel was laid down \add to sleep;\add*
That the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* called Samuel : and he answered , Here \add am\add* I.
And he ran unto Eli , and said , Here \add am\add* I ; for thou calledst me. And he said , I called not; lie down again. And he went and lay down.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* called yet again , Samuel. And Samuel arose and went to Eli , and said , Here \add am\add* I; for thou didst call me. And he answered , I called not, my son ; lie down again.

Now Samuel did not yet know the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, neither was the word of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* yet revealed unto him.  +  r 3.7  t Now…: or, Thus did Samuel before he knew the \+nd LORD\+nd*, and before the word of the \+nd LORD\+nd* was revealed unto him *

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* called Samuel again the third time. And he arose and went to Eli , and said , Here \add am\add* I; for thou didst call me. And Eli perceived that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had called the child.

Therefore Eli said unto Samuel , Go , lie down : and it shall be, if he call thee, that thou shalt say , Speak , \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for thy servant heareth. So Samuel went and lay down in his place.
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came , and stood , and called as at other times , Samuel , Samuel. Then Samuel answered , Speak ; for thy servant heareth. \p
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* said to Samuel , Behold, I will do a thing in Israel , at which both the ears of every one that heareth it shall tingle.
In that day I will perform against Eli all \add things\add* which I have spoken concerning his house : when I begin , I will also make an end.\f + \fr 3.12 \ft when…: Heb. beginning and ending\f*

For I have told him that I will judge his house for ever for the iniquity which he knoweth ; because his sons made themselves vile , and he restrained them not.\f + \fr 3.13 \ft For I…: or, And I will tell him\f*\f + \fr 3.13 \ft vile: or, accursed\f*\f + \fr 3.13 \ft restrained…: Heb. frowned not upon them\f*
And therefore I have sworn unto the house of Eli , that the iniquity of Eli’s house shall not be purged with sacrifice nor offering for ever. \p
¶ And Samuel lay until the morning , and opened the doors of the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. And Samuel feared to shew Eli the vision.
Then Eli called Samuel , and said , Samuel , my son. And he answered , Here \add am\add* I.

And he said , What \add is\add* the thing that \add the \+nd Lord\+nd*\add* hath said unto thee? I pray thee hide \add it\add* not from me: God do so to thee, and more also , if thou hide \add any\add* thing from me of all the things that he said unto thee.\f + \fr 3.17 \ft more also: Heb. so add\f*\f + \fr 3.17 \ft thing: or, word\f*

And Samuel told him every whit , and hid nothing from him. And he said , It \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: let him do what seemeth him good.\f + \fr 3.18 \ft every…: Heb. all the things, or, words\f* \p
¶ And Samuel grew , and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was with him, and did let none of his words fall to the ground.

And all Israel from Dan even to Beer-sheba knew that Samuel \add was\add* established \add to be\add* a prophet of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 3.20 \ft established: or, faithful\f*

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* appeared again in Shiloh : for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* revealed himself to Samuel in Shiloh by the word of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
